amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce FDA funding by $373 million to equal the FY09 level.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in part B of House Report 111-191 to reduce FDA funding by $373 million to equal the FY09 level.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 292 (Roll no. 501).
